org.apache.flink.yarn

类 YarnFlinkResourceManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • akka.actor.UntypedActor
      • org.apache.flink.runtime.akka.FlinkUntypedActor
        • org.apache.flink.runtime.clusterframework.FlinkResourceManager<RegisteredYarnWorkerNode>
          • org.apache.flink.yarn.YarnFlinkResourceManager
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    akka.actor.Actor

    public class YarnFlinkResourceManager
extends FlinkResourceManager<RegisteredYarnWorkerNode>
    Specialized Flink Resource Manager implementation for YARN clusters. It is started as the YARN ApplicationMaster and implements the YARN-specific logic for container requests and failure monitoring.

    • 嵌套类概要

      Looks up the getContainersFromPreviousAttempts method on RegisterApplicationMasterResponse once and saves the method.

      Host name for the container running this process.

      Containers we have released, where we are waiting for an acknowledgement that they are released.

      The containers where a TaskManager is starting and we are waiting for it to register.

      The default heartbeat interval during regular operation.

      Environment variable name of the final container id used by the Flink ResourceManager.

      The number of failed containers since the master became active.

      The heartbeat interval while the resource master is waiting for containers.
      private int maxFailedContainers
      Number of failed TaskManager containers before stopping the application. -1 means infinite.

      Client to communicate with the Node manager and launch TaskManager processes.

      The number of containers requested, but not yet granted.

      Callback handler for the asynchronous resourceManagerClient.

      Client to communicate with the Resource Manager (YARN's master).

      Context information used to start a TaskManager Java process.

      The TaskManager container parameters (like container memory size).

      Web interface URL, may be null.
      private org.apache.hadoop.yarn.conf.YarnConfiguration yarnConfig
      The YARN / Hadoop configuration object.
      private int yarnHeartbeatIntervalMillis
      Default heartbeat interval between this actor and the YARN ResourceManager.

      • shutdownApplication

        protected void shutdownApplication(ApplicationStatus finalStatus,
                                   java.lang.String optionalDiagnostics)
        从类复制的说明: FlinkResourceManager
        The framework specific code for shutting down the application. This should report the application's final status and shut down the resource manager cleanly. This method also needs to make sure all pending containers that are not registered yet are returned.
        指定者:
        shutdownApplication 在类中 FlinkResourceManager<RegisteredYarnWorkerNode>
        参数:
        finalStatus - The application status to report.
        optionalDiagnostics - An optional diagnostics message.

      • fatalError

        protected void fatalError(java.lang.String message,
                          java.lang.Throwable error)
        从类复制的说明: FlinkResourceManager
        Notifies the resource master of a fatal error.

        IMPORTANT: This should not cleanly shut down this master, but exit it in such a way that a high-availability setting would restart this or fail over to another master.

        指定者:
        fatalError 在类中 FlinkResourceManager<RegisteredYarnWorkerNode>

      • reacceptRegisteredWorkers

        protected java.util.Collection<RegisteredYarnWorkerNode> reacceptRegisteredWorkers(java.util.Collection<ResourceID> toConsolidate)
        从类复制的说明: FlinkResourceManager
        This method is called when the resource manager starts after a failure and reconnects to the leader JobManager, who still has some workers registered. The method is used to consolidate the view between resource manager and JobManager. The resource manager gets the list of TaskManagers that the JobManager considers available and should return a list or nodes that the resource manager considers available. After that, the JobManager is informed of loss of all TaskManagers that are not part of the returned list. It is possible that the resource manager initially confirms some TaskManagers to be alive, even through they are in an uncertain status, if it later sends necessary failure notifications via calling FlinkResourceManager.notifyWorkerFailed(ResourceID, String).
        指定者:
        reacceptRegisteredWorkers 在类中 FlinkResourceManager<RegisteredYarnWorkerNode>
        参数:
        toConsolidate - The list of TaskManagers that the JobManager knows.
        返回:
        The subset of TaskManagers that the resource manager can confirm to be alive.

      • getNumWorkerRequestsPending

        protected int getNumWorkerRequestsPending()
        从类复制的说明: FlinkResourceManager
        Gets the number of requested workers that have not yet been granted.
        指定者:
        getNumWorkerRequestsPending 在类中 FlinkResourceManager<RegisteredYarnWorkerNode>
        返回:
        The number pending worker requests. Must never be smaller than 0.

      • getNumWorkersPendingRegistration

        protected int getNumWorkersPendingRegistration()
        从类复制的说明: FlinkResourceManager
        Gets the number of containers that have been started, but where the TaskManager has not yet registered at the job manager.
        指定者:
        getNumWorkersPendingRegistration 在类中 FlinkResourceManager<RegisteredYarnWorkerNode>
        返回:
        The number of started containers pending TaskManager registration. Must never be smaller than 0.

      • createActorProps

        public static akka.actor.Props createActorProps(java.lang.Class<? extends YarnFlinkResourceManager> actorClass,
                                                Configuration flinkConfig,
                                                org.apache.hadoop.yarn.conf.YarnConfiguration yarnConfig,
                                                LeaderRetrievalService leaderRetrievalService,
                                                java.lang.String applicationMasterHostName,
                                                java.lang.String webFrontendURL,
                                                ContaineredTaskManagerParameters taskManagerParameters,
                                                org.apache.hadoop.yarn.api.records.ContainerLaunchContext taskManagerLaunchContext,
                                                int numInitialTaskManagers,
                                                org.slf4j.Logger log)
        Creates the props needed to instantiate this actor.

        Rather than extracting and validating parameters in the constructor, this factory method takes care of that. That way, errors occur synchronously, and are not swallowed simply in a failed asynchronous attempt to start the actor.

        参数:
        actorClass - The actor class, to allow overriding this actor with subclasses for testing.
        flinkConfig - The Flink configuration object.
        yarnConfig - The YARN configuration object.
        applicationMasterHostName - The hostname where this application master actor runs.
        webFrontendURL - The URL of the tracking web frontend.
        taskManagerParameters - The parameters for launching TaskManager containers.
        taskManagerLaunchContext - The parameters for launching the TaskManager processes in the TaskManager containers.
        numInitialTaskManagers - The initial number of TaskManagers to allocate.
        log - The logger to log to.
        返回:
        The Props object to instantiate the YarnFlinkResourceManager actor.
